title: Jay Costa
added: In 2013, Costa’s chief of staff, Tony Lepore, testified under oath that Lepore functioned as a “middle man” in a corruption scheme involving awarding lucrative state contracts. <ref>{{Cite web|url= https://www.pennlive.com/capitol-notebook/2013/03/senate_staffer_keeps_job_despi.html|title=Senate staffer still on state payroll despite role in Turnpike scandal |last=Micek|first=John|website=PennLive|language=en|access-date=2021-02-17}}</ref> As of February 2021, Lepore is still working for Costa. <ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.legis.state.pa.us/cfdocs/admin/ld/gen_search.cfm?office=HARRISBURG%252DD%2520%2528SEN%2529&agency=SEN|title=Legislative Directory|language=en|access-date=2021-02-17}}</ref>
